skilllist.skilldesc: Detona gains a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> for 12s each time it or Barats damages an enemy with their skills (up to 10 stacks). Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> increases Detona's size, and grants 3-9 extra Hybrid Defense (scales with the level of <font color="a6aafb">Detona's Welcome</font>) and 5% extra Resilience. At max stacks, Detona's Basic Attacks will be replaced with <font color="a6aafb">Trample</font>, which deals <font color="fba51f"> (+140% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="26e407">(+3.5% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a circular area, slows them by 40% for 0.2s, and refreshes the duration of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> with each hit.

Detona spits contaminated oil in the target direction, dealing 60<font color="26e407"> (+7% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area. Barats then ignites the oil with a firecracker, dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+160% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area (only 50% damage to Creeps).

The area of effect of <font color="a6aafb">So-Called Teamwork</font> increases with the number of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> stacks.

Barats fires two missiles at the target location, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing enemies by 40% for 1s. The missiles expel fumes from their exhausts upon landing, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a rectangular area and pushing them toward Barats.

After a short delay, Detona charges in the target direction, dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="26e407">(+1.2% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit, devouring and suppressing them for 1.2s before spitting them out. If the target hits an enemy hero or a wall after being spit out, the target will cause an explosion, they and nearby enemies will take an additional 180<font color="fba51f"> (+105% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="26e407">(+1.8% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and be stunned for 1s.
For the duration, Barats becomes immune to control effects. If the channeling is canceled, 60% of the skill cooldown will be refunded.
<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Detona gains 4 stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> upon respawn.

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by <%Num1>. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+7% Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Recovery: Recovers <font color="26e407"> (+0.025 Total HP)</font> HP per second (reduced to <font color="26e407"> (+0.005 Total HP)</font> HP per second over 5s after taking damage).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recovery: Recovers <font color="26e407"> (+0.025 Total HP)</font> HP per second (reduced to <font color="26e407"> (+0.005 Total HP)</font> HP per second over 5s after taking damage).

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

assist.desc: Barats works best with Supports who can give him Movement Speed to make up for his lack of mobility, such as Mathilda and Angela.

strong.desc: Barats counters Tank heroes that rely on CC skills, such as Belerick and Lolita, since the extra Resilience provided by his Passive will greatly reduce the duration of their CC.

weak.desc: Barats is countered by agile Marksmen who can deal high damage to Tanks, such as Karrie and Moskov, because Barats lacks mobility and his skills can be avoided, making these heroes very difficult to kill.
